attacks.name: Aqua Liner
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Mouth Pump
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
